content: To continue along the main path head up the stairs and onto the ashen path. Follow it up and around to the left, crossing over the bridge and heading toward the archway in the distance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Emerald Hall' and the sub-subsection 'Missable Transformation Spell'.
The content is as follows:
To continue along the main path head up the stairs and onto the ashen path. Follow it up and around to the left, crossing over the bridge and heading toward the archway in the distance.
